name: Makeshift Mouse King
description:
After escaping the animal testing laboratory, TestMouse27 rejoices in his freedom only for it to be cut short by his unexpected trip to the local sewer.

Controls:

Keyboard

Movement - WASD/Arrow Keys
Melee - Z/J
Crossbow - X/K
Pickup/Throw Items - C/L
Jump - Spacebar
Progress Story - Any Key

Xbox Controller

Movement - Left Analog
Melee - X
Crossbow - Right Trigger
Pickup/Throw Items - B
Jump - A
Progress Story - A
